description: These 15-minute sausage wraps with a sticky barbecue glaze will be a fast favourite with the kids. Try this easy recipe today.
keywords: Sausage dishes,High fibre,Sausage,High protein,Quick & easy lunch,Weeknight dinner,Jan Feb 2021,Spinach,Beef
name: Sticky Sausage Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red capsicum, quartered, deseeded, thinly sliced
1 Lebanese cucumber, cut into thin strips

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sauce, honey and garlic in a small bowl.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook sausages and capsicum, turning, for 8 minutes or until cooked through. Remove capsicum from pan. Add honey mixture and cook for 2 minutes, turning sausages to coat in sauce.
Meanwhile, combine coleslaw and dressing in a bowl. Season.
Place coleslaw, sausages, capsicum, cucumber and spinach on bread and roll to enclose filling, then serve.
